revised_title: Coherent Optical Techniques for Broadband ISDN and Subscriber Loop Applications
tldr: This article discusses the potential applications of coherent optical communication techniques in future telecommunication networks, particularly in the trunk network and subscriber loop area. The authors explore the use of optical amplifiers, integrated optics, and various distribution techniques for television programs, emphasizing the need for further development and integration of optoelectronic components to make optical communication technology more cost-effective and widely adopted.
